parameters: It looks like this could turn?
Greetings young saint. Here for the morning \c[1]Magic \c[0]lessons,
Yes, I am ready to learn!
Yes, I am ready to learn!
You seem eager to learn, but have yet to learn any
Why don’t you look around in my study and see what you can
Come back when you're ready! Don't forget you can nap to \c[27]Heal\c[0]
I can sense your magical powers have grown a bit.
But magical abilities are just as important as your physical ones.
Try casting that \c[1]Spell\c[0] you learned on me.
It seems you may need to study some more...
Come to me when you've learned the \c[1]Spells\c[0].
Very well done. Now your combative abilities go further than just
I am very proud of your progress so far.
Couldn’t have done it without your help Adin. Thank you for all
The pleasure is all mine. Now I must continue to study.
I suggest you continue studying as well!
Now I must continue to study.
I suggest you continue studying as well!
Good morning Ecclesia. You’re up and early nicely today
Here for your morning combat lessons I assume?
Yes, I am here for my combat lessons.
Shall we get started right away?
Haha! I like your enthusiasm kiddo. But aren’t we
No warrior is complete without their weapon. I see you don’t have
your hammer yet. Go to the armory and fetch it up
No warrior is complete without their weapon. I see you don’t have
your hammer yet. Go to the armory and fetch it up
I see you got your hammer, Now we can start.
Let me see what you have learned and remembered so far!
That was an amazing showcase of battle, Ecclesia!
I feel secure knowing we have you on our side, haha!
Thank you Theo. But I am nowhere near as strong as you yet!
I will continue practicing until I can beat you in a fair fight.
I am looking forward to it!
Enjoy the rest of your day, Sister Ecclesia!
Do you want to continue to the next day?
And so, Ecclesia and Fleurdelis retired to their chambers to await
